description: A cienaCesInetMgmtAddrChangeNotification is sent when the
inet address of the associated interface changes.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-MGMT-INTERFACE-MIB::cienaCesInetMgmtAddrChangeNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 8 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-MGMT-INTERFACE-MIB::cienaCesInetMgmtInterfaceNotifIndex i 9999 CIENA-CES-MGMT-INTERFACE-MIB::cienaCesInetMgmtInterfaceNotifAddrType i 1 CIENA-CES-MGMT-INTERFACE-MIB::cienaCesInetMgmtInterfaceNotifAddr s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-MGMT-INTERFACE-MIB::cienaCesInetMgmtInterfaceAddrPrefixLength u 0 CIENA-CES-MGMT-INTERFACE-MIB::cienaCesInetMgmtInterfaceName s EXAMPLE

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: Specifies the management interface index.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-MGMT-INTERFACE-MIB::cienaCesInetMgmtInterfaceNotifIndex

description: This OID specifies the Inet address type of the OIDs cienaCesInetMgmtInterfaceNotifAddr and
cienaCesInetMgmtInterfacePrefixLength.
When representing:
ipv4 : cienaCesInetMgmtInterfaceNotifAddr should be compliant with InetAddressIPv4 from RFC 4001
ipv6 : cienaCesInetMgmtInterfaceNotifAddr should be compliant with InetAddressIPv6 from RFC 4001
variables.name: CIENA-CES-MGMT-INTERFACE-MIB::cienaCesInetMgmtInterfaceNotifAddrType

description: Inet address associated with this interface.
This OID should be used in conjuction with cienaCesInetMgmtInterfaceNotifAddrType.
This value should be compliant with RFC 4001 InetAddressType.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-MGMT-INTERFACE-MIB::cienaCesInetMgmtInterfaceNotifAddr

description: Specifies the address prefix length. This OID should be used in conjuction
with cienaCesInetMgmtInterfaceAddrType.
This OID should be compliant with RFC 4001 InetAddressPrefixLength.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-MGMT-INTERFACE-MIB::cienaCesInetMgmtInterfaceAddrPrefixLength

description: The management interface name for this interface.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-MGMT-INTERFACE-MIB::cienaCesInetMgmtInterfaceName

description: A cienaCesInetMgmtAddrChangeNotification is sent when a new interface
is added.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-MGMT-INTERFACE-MIB::cienaCesInetMgmtAddrAddedNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 8 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-MGMT-INTERFACE-MIB::cienaCesInetMgmtInterfaceNotifIndex i 9999 CIENA-CES-MGMT-INTERFACE-MIB::cienaCesInetMgmtInterfaceNotifAddrType i 1 CIENA-CES-MGMT-INTERFACE-MIB::cienaCesInetMgmtInterfaceNotifAddr s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-MGMT-INTERFACE-MIB::cienaCesInetMgmtInterfaceAddrPrefixLength u 0 CIENA-CES-MGMT-INTERFACE-MIB::cienaCesInetMgmtInterfaceName s EXAMPLE

variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: Specifies the management interface index.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-MGMT-INTERFACE-MIB::cienaCesInetMgmtInterfaceNotifIndex

description: Inet address associated with this interface.
This OID should be used in conjuction with cienaCesInetMgmtInterfaceNotifAddrType.
This value should be compliant with RFC 4001 InetAddressType.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-MGMT-INTERFACE-MIB::cienaCesInetMgmtInterfaceNotifAddr

description: Specifies the address prefix length. This OID should be used in conjuction
with cienaCesInetMgmtInterfaceAddrType.
This OID should be compliant with RFC 4001 InetAddressPrefixLength.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-MGMT-INTERFACE-MIB::cienaCesInetMgmtInterfaceAddrPrefixLength

description: The management interface name for this interface.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-MGMT-INTERFACE-MIB::cienaCesInetMgmtInterfaceName

description: A cienaCesInetMgmtAddrChangeNotification is sent when an interface
is removed.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-MGMT-INTERFACE-MIB::cienaCesInetMgmtAddrRemovedNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 8 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-MGMT-INTERFACE-MIB::cienaCesInetMgmtInterfaceNotifIndex i 9999 CIENA-CES-MGMT-INTERFACE-MIB::cienaCesInetMgmtInterfaceNotifAddrType i 1 CIENA-CES-MGMT-INTERFACE-MIB::cienaCesInetMgmtInterfaceNotifAddr s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-MGMT-INTERFACE-MIB::cienaCesInetMgmtInterfaceAddrPrefixLength u 0 CIENA-CES-MGMT-INTERFACE-MIB::cienaCesInetMgmtInterfaceName s EXAMPLE

description: A cienaCesInetGatewayAddrChangeNotification is sent
when the address associated with the gateway is changed.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-MGMT-INTERFACE-MIB::cienaCesInetGatewayAddrChangeNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 8 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-MGMT-INTERFACE-MIB::cienaCesInetGatewayNotifAddrType i 1 CIENA-CES-MGMT-INTERFACE-MIB::cienaCesInetGatewayNotifAddr s EXAMPLE

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: This OID specifies the Inet Address Type of the OID cienaCesInetGatewayNotifAddr
When representing :
ipv4 : cienaCesInetGatewayNotifAddr should be compliant with InetAddressIPv4 from RFC 4001
ipv6 : cienaCesInetGatewayNotifAddr should be compliant with InetAddressIPv6 from RFC 4001
ipv6z : cienaCesInetGatewayNotifAddr should be compliant with InetAddressIPv6z from RFC 4001
variables.name: CIENA-CES-MGMT-INTERFACE-MIB::cienaCesInetGatewayNotifAddrType

description: Inet address associated with this interface.
This OID should be used in conjuction with cienaCesInetGatewayNotifAddrType.
The InetAddress set here should be compliant with RFC 4001 InetAddressType.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-MGMT-INTERFACE-MIB::cienaCesInetGatewayNotifAddr

description: A cienaCesInetGatewayAddrAddNotification is sent
when a new gateway is added.
